title: AJK PM pays tribute to army personnel for scarifying their lives for motherland
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 9 (APP):The Azad Jammu and Kashmir Prime Minister Raja Farooq Haider Khan has expressed deep grief and sorrow over the martyrdom of six security personnel, including an officer in an explosion in Buleda tehsil of Balochistanâ€™s Kech district on Friday.
In a statement issued here on Saturday, the Prime Minister paid glowing tribute to major Nadeem Abbas Bhatti, Naik Jamshed, Lance Naik Taimoor, Lance Naik Khizar Hayat, Sepoy Sajid and Sepoy Nadeem for scarifying their lives while protecting the motherland.
Raja Farooq Haider Khan condoled with the bereaved families and prayed for their patience and higher ranks of the martyrs.
He said that nation is proud over their valiant sons who are rendering matchless sacrifices for the defense of their motherland.
The Prime Minister said that nation is standing shoulder to shoulder with Pak Army to eliminate the menace of terrorism from the country.
In another statement, Prime Minister Raja Farooq Haider Khan condoled the passing away of the mother of Senator Faisal Javed and prayed for the grant of eternal peace to the departed soul and fortitude to the family members to bear this massive loss.
